updates.update_userinfo: New Fantasy Black Cat Pin Project!
updates.update_content:
Hello again,
I hope that you and your family are doing well during these challenging times.
I am writing today to let you know that I have just launched a new pin campaign that I have been working on for the past few months and am very excited to share!
It is a fourteen pin collection featuring black cats dressed as various fantasy archetypes!  I was inspired by the player classes for 5e D&D, but you certainly don't have to be a tabletop gaming fan to enjoy these heroic designs!

Hello again, 
I wanted to let you know about a new pin design available in my shop, the Encircled Wolf!
It is the sister pin to my Encircled Raven pin design from this campaign.  I may do more Encircled creature pins in the future, but for now the raven finally has someone to talk to!

updates.update_userinfo: White Feathers, Bees, Panda, and a Bookish Design!
updates.update_content:
Good morning, 
I hope that you have been well these past few months!
I wanted to let you know that I have a new campaign up on KS and one of the offerings is a white feather!  The Black feather was such a hit, and I had a lot of requests to have a white and gold version of that pin, so I decided to make it happen!

updates.update_userinfo: Witch Cat Pins are LIVE on KS!
updates.update_content:
Hello again, 
I am excited to say that earlier today I launched my witch cat pin campaign for this year!
I have EARLY-BIRD pledge tiers for three pins and six pins that are available until Saturday morning, so if you are into black cats and/or witchy things please come check it out!  
Thank you so much for your time, and have a fantastic rest of the week!

Hello again, 
I thought you might like to see a bit of a sneak peek of my next project, which will go live in mid-August!
Every year since I created Frost Dragon Designs I have done a Kickstarter for Witch Cat themed pin designs. I am excited to say that I will be keeping that tradition again this year!

updates.update_userinfo: Aqua Pals is Live on Kickstarter!
updates.update_content:
Good morning, 
I hope that things are going well for you so far in June!  
By now you should have received your pins from Black Feathers (a few of you international backers may still be waiting I think, but they have been shipped.)  I hope that the pins have exceeded your expectations!

Good morning, 
I hope this message finds you well.  
Thank You
First and foremost, thank you so much for supporting this project!

Good morning,
As of this morning everything has shipped out!  
You should have already received an email containing your tracking number.  
I estimate the packages will arrive this week for the US backers, and as early as next week for the non-US backers!

Good morning, 
There was a small customs issue, but it has been resolved and the pins are here!
I am now gleefully inspecting pins, packaging pins, printing more shipping labels, and shipping pins!  (Sorry, no time for pictures!)
If all goes well they will all be handed off to USPS for shipping by the 28th at the latest!

Good morning, 
I wanted to provide you with the current timeline for shipping out the rewards!
May 17-18:  Final days to change/update your shipping address.
May 19:  I take a deep breath and wait.

campaign.story:
Hi, I’m Meredith and I am known for painting watercolor fairies, but I also love anything with lines and ink. The idea for this campaign all started when I rediscovered my love of ink drawing during Inktober a few years ago. I've continued exploring ink drawings beyond Inktober. Join me and the moth fairies as I continue my ink-filled journey through faerieland. 
I’m Kickstarting a 42 page sketchbook sized art book filled with botanical fairies, tiny moth-ical fairies and mystical foxes. The book will be filled with artwork created over the last 3 years as well as more recently, as I’ve explored new techniques.
You can view more of my art on my website, or follow my updates on instagram and facebook.
The Book:
The book will be a 6x9 inch, 42 page perfect bound paperback filled cover-to-cover with ink drawings of fairies, fauns, foxes and kitsune and their forest world.  
Inkwork Book
Inkwork Art Book
 More illustrations:
Some of the illustrations included
See more images instagram hashtag #inkworkledbymothlight
Limited Edition Pin:
Inspired by moth fairies and ginkgo trees, I have designed a limited edition of 100 moth fairy enamel pins. Each pin is made with gold colored metal, is 1.5 inches wide, and has two pinbacks (for extra security) with rubber clutches. My name is printed on the back.
Limited Edition Moth Pin
Open Edition Fox Moth Pin:
Due to the popularity of the pins, I have designed a pin based on my fox moth drawing. This pin will be made with gold colored metal and 1.5 inches wide. The fox moth pin will be unlimited so If you've already backed for the moth fairy, the fox will be available as an add-on.

Open edition fox pin

Foxtail Kitsune Print:
I love designing costumes for my characters! I've drawn a Japanese kitsune (fox spirit) with a nine tailed fox kimono. This will be an 8.5x11 print on heavy cardstock, with gold foil accents. (Too add on to and existing pledge please wait until after the campaign, when you will be able to do though the backerkit survey)
Kitsune Print
The Rewards:
The Book:
- One copy of Inkwork Led by Mothlight book
Book & Pin
- One copy of the Inkwork Led by Mothlight book
- One limited edition moth fairy pin
Book, Pin & Print
- One copy of Inkwork Led by Mothlight book
- One limited edition moth fairy pin
- One foil finished Foxtail Kimono print
Originals:
Original Drawing - Kitsune Procession
Original Drawing - Foxtail Kimono
Original Drawing - Ginkgo Fairy
Original Drawing - Fairy Courtship
Original Drawing - Dogwood
Original Drawing - Anemone Faun
Stretch Goals:

At 12000, backers with a physical reward will receive a moth fairy sticker!

At 16,500, backers with a physical reward will receive a moth fairy sticker!
Add-Ons:
Additional copies of the book and prints, and fox moth pin will be available as add-ons through BackerKit surveys (when I get your shipping information) at the end of the campaign. No need to anything extra to your pledge now.
Add-on prints
A Note on Shipping: While I try to keep shipping costs as low as possible, I have no control over the postal rates. International prices have gone up considerably each year for the last several years. International customers should consider the customs fees as well as any mail holding costs set by their individual countries. It will not be possible to mark packages as anything other than merchandise.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Mishaps in printing and shipping are always a possibility but I feel confident in my chosen printer. I have not done foil printing previously, but have a backup plan if it doesn't work out.

I have successfully fulfilled three previous Kickstarters.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Hi everyone!
I just got the printed book proof on Tuesday. I'm happy to say the printing quality looks great and there weren't any issues with the colors. I am working on editing a few minor things in the file and will resubmit them for printing.  I originally said it was going to be 42 pages, but it has ended up 46.
Hopefully I will have them in a couple weeks. I most likely won't be able to ship until August because of conventions at the end of July.

Hello, I'm Sema!  I am one of the artists of Evening Shadow!
 Pin Specifications:
All pins are 1.5 inches
Hard Enamel
Gold Metal
Rubber backing Clasps
Backing Card
Every Pin has a variation they will presented once they are unlocked.

January-Early February: Kickstarter campaign runs.
February: Backer surveys are sent out and pledges are collected. (Pins won't be able to be produced in February due to overseas holidays)

Please feel free to give me a follow on my Instagram, while you are at it please don't be shy to share this project with you friends and family, every little share helps out so much! 
You can check out all of Evening Shadow's artwork on our Facebook page!
Here are examples of our other pins on our Etsy Shop.
Thank you so much!!
campaign.risks:

We did a lot of research for our last Kickstarter and received beautiful, highly detailed pins from our manufacturer. We are confident that they'll come through for us this time as well. If this happens, we will be sure to notify everyone via updates through Kickstarter. Colors may be slightly different than shown due to differences in monitors as well.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
What would be in Mucha's Garden?
I have always loved Mucha, especially the floral splendor found in every work of his art.  Each pin will be hard enamel, with a metal clutch and will be individually presented on an illustrated backing card.  You can also add additional pins to your pledge by adding $11/each.
A little about me, I’m Alice Starling, and I’m an independent illustrator and designer living in Boston, MA with my two little cats, Pigeon and Magpie. I started my brand with a mission to share my love for the curiously creepy and undeniably adorable with like minded weirdos like you all over the world, and that’s why I love Kickstarter! I’ve been an avid kickstarter backer for a long time now, and nothing feels better than helping a maker realize their awesome dreams. Now, I’m the one that needs a little help funding my dreams… and this is your opportunity to get some tasty spoils from my projects!
I’ll be updating the campaign as we progress with any new designs. You can also visit my instagram or shop for more sneak peeks and looks at my current merchandise! I’m most active on instagram so follow me there for the most updates!
𝐅𝐔𝐍𝐃𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐁𝐑𝐄𝐀𝐊𝐃𝐎𝐖𝐍❣
Pin Production ❥ 60%
Backing Card ❥ 5%
Production Fees ❥ 10%
Shipping & Packaging ❥ 25%
♥ ♥ ♥
𝐓𝐈𝐌𝐄𝐋𝐈𝐍𝐄❣
January ❥ Kickstarter begins! Manufacturer contacted and plans made.
February ❥ Kickstarter ends, funds are collected.
March ❥ Funds are received and order is placed! Production begins.
April-May ❥ Pins are received and are packaged up nicely by myself.
June ❥ By June latest all pins will be mailed out and received!
♥ ♥ ♥
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I have successful campaigns under my belt and I have been an avid backer for pins and other goods through this site and have become very familiar with the process! In addition, I've done extensive research to ensure I'm working with a manufacturer who has shown themselves to have a high quality of work and to deliver on time, therefore I don't anticipate any issues. However, these pins are being manufactured for me - therefore the production process is outside of my control. Potentially we could hit delays if the manufacturer experiences any issues. Other small issues could be slight changes in linework or color. If, however, there are any changes, rest assured I have a meticulous eye and wouldn't let any changes be made that affected the quality of the design. I will keep all backers updated via Kickstarter updates as to any changes or otherwise.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi guys!!
I've been checking the tracking every couple hours, and they did get slowed down by customs (and a typhoon! :o )  bUT They are arriving to me on Monday!!  I am spending my weekend addressing your packages to head out to ya'll ASAP when the pins arrive.  Thanks again for all your patience, guys. T-T It's been the most stressful set of pins I've done to date, but can't wait for the journey to be coming to an end and all the pins to be affixed in your favorite places.  I'll be getting nose deep in packages, so please feel free to get in touch if you have any concerns but also, if I don't get back to you right away and it's crucial give me a little friendly nudge and I'll jump right on it once I can~  Everyone (that hasn't received their package yet) will be getting an email next few days with their tracking info.  This won't be from Kickstarter or USPS, it'll be from me through PirateShip (yarrr.. lol.) so if you're wondering what that is, that'll be your pins~

Hi guys!
Good news:  the first half of the packages are going out this Friday!  You'll be receiving an email tomorrow if yours is going out!  These include all of the ones that don't have remade pins in them, if you're unsure if that's you and you don't receive an email, feel free to reach out!  I want to thank you guys for your patience... it's a tricksy business running a small business on your own, and pin manufacturing is a whole other thing.  I couldn't do it without your help, friends.  As for the remade pins, they're headed out to me and should be shipping out to you all the first week of August.  I'll have them in my hands super soon and then they'll be popped right into prelabeled packages so I get them out posthaste!

Hi guys!
So, truth be told I was on vacation when I received those same photos I shared with you from my partner...  but when I got home I realized they are simply terrible at taking pictures and only a few of the designs were problematic.  The poppy and peony look great, so the hydrangea, two bottles, lily bouquet and marigold are the only ones that are going to be remade.  I will be sorting and addressing packages that can be filled with the good-to-go pins this upcoming week so if any address changes are going to be made, do it now please or make me aware!!!  This being said, I'll attach a picture and if anyone with problematic pins in their order would prefer not to wait for the remake and would like to receive their order anyway, let me know and I'll send out pins from the original batch.  I've attached a better photo so you all can see the pins accurately represented.

Hi all!!!
The pins have arrived~  I do have good and bad news though...  Good news:  The molds turned out wonderfully on (almost) all pins!  The one exception was the hydrangea, where the manufacturer decided to omit the cutouts without telling me.  Otherwise, the more complex pins are all beaaaauuutifully molded.  The bad news is really that the colors on *more than half* of the designs have major issues.  On some, they're completely wrong.  Others they're just a bit off.  I have already communicated with the manu and they're going to remake the pins for me ASAP.  And I acquired a Pantone card so I can be 250% sure the colors are going to be perfect this time.  I'll attach some pictures of the pins so you can get an idea.  The designs that will be remade are the poppy, lily bouquet, marigold, orchid bottle, bleeding heart, hydrangea and peony.  I would like to begin sending the pins out for those orders that can be filled.  In the meantime, I apologize for the further delay.  It shouldn't be long at all for the replacements, my manu assured me that they will be on their way to me in less than 14 days.

Hi guys!!
Got a really exciting picture from my manufacturer this morning and wanted to send it your way...

Hi friends!
WOW, that took a while.  187 emails with my manufacturer later...  all the designs have been approved by me to move forward!  I've attached some of my favorite for you to preview, but rest assured every one of them is lovely.  If there's any in particular you guys would like to see, let me know and I'll try to post it up as soon as I can!  Now what we need to wait for is process photos from the manu...  I'm sure I can't wait as much as you guys!!  In the meantime, let me know if you have any questions and feel free to update your addresses as needed.

Hi guys,
Just wanted to touch base with you all.  First and foremost, I need to tell you that the expected date you guys will receive these lovelies will definitely be later than May, but I'm hoping it won't be later than July.  There's been a lot of arguing with my manufacturer over colors that I want to get right and making sure they don't remove cutouts or simplify the designs.  I knew a Mucha inspired pin set would be a challenge but I guess I didn't expect this.  Rest assured they will all be in production soon and the moment I get a photo to show you all you can bet it's gonna be the first thing you see that day~  Thanks again for your patience guys!  I'm definitely thinking up a special something to send along to all backers for just being the best~

Hi guys,
Just wanted to check in and let you know that things are moving along, but at a slightly slower pace than initially anticipated.  This is my first time working with this manufacturer and they insisted on going over each design individually instead of taking all my feedback at once.  Funny how email feels like snail mail these days.  Since there are so many designs and I want to get them all just right, there has been a lot of and forth tweaking and I've had to argue for certain design elements to be upheld.  I had a feeling this collection would be a little less straightforward since it's so color and detail heavy.  Thanks all for your patience, I think these babies will be worth the wait~

Hi guys!
Just wanted to check in and let you know that the order has been placed, and I'm in communication with my manu tweaking art and color before giving the go ahead!  Can't wait to see these lovelies irl, and I'm sure that makes two of us.
Alice

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The artwork shown here is the final product. That being said, slight changes due occur when translating the designs to a physical product so there may be some minor alterations. The final designs will stay as close to these initial concepts as much as possible.

I have a reliable manufacturer who I have been working closely with for the better part of a year. I'm well-versed in the production process and will do my best to deliver a great product.

That said, this is an all or nothing campaign. If the first goal isn't met then I simply do not have the funds to put the pins into production. The very same goes for stickers or any additional rewards.
This is the risk that comes with doing a Kickstarter.

However, this is my SIXTH pin set here on Kickstarter!
My other projects were fully funded and can be seen here!
[ http://kck.st/2q76Msk ]
[http://kck.st/2CWE8Pk]
[http://kck.st/2LeUp5N]
[http://kck.st/2vLnEXZ]
[http://kck.st/2yK8lzr]

Due to the nature of this campaign and the amount of designs, I need to make it clear that ONLY the designs with the goal met will be available for choosing. I would love for everything to be available from the get-go but I need to make sure the funds are secured.

If the campaign is successful then I will be aiming for an early April delivery.

If you have any questions, please let me know!
Thank you so much for reading. Have a wonderful day! <3
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello, everyone!
I have some happy (and very exhausting) news for you all:
All orders have been shipped!

Hello, everyone!
I have some fantastic news for you all!
The rest of the pins have arrived and now the set is complete!

Hello, everyone!
Well, good news and bad news!
Bad news: some of the pins will be taking longer than expected due to their complexity/quantity. My manu has said that they should take an extra week so hopefully they don't take too long.

Hello, everyone!
Long time no update! I promise, this will only be a quick post.
Products are FINALLY starting to arrive to my home and the first of these are the lanyards!

Hello, everyone!
I just wanted to let you all know that all Backerkit surveys have been sent out!
They were sent to the email you have your Kickstarter account tied to so please make sure to thoroughly check if you have received it in the appropriate email. There's always the small chance that it was sent to your spam/junk folder so please double-check there as well.

FULLY FUNDED AND THEN SOME WOOOOOOO
Oh my GOSH I just, cannot believe the overwhelming support you guys have shown my little project. Honestly, words can't describe how stoked I am to have you guys like my work this much and seeing your enthusiasm for my products is the absolute greatest feeling in the world. I'm so grateful so thank you again! <3<3 Thank you! Thank you all so so much!
So, what happens now?

Hello, everyone!
While there isn't much to report on seeing as the Kickstarter is still steadily going along, I just wanted to share with you all a picture of the sample stickers I received!

Hello, everyone!
I'm overjoyed to announce that:
Lanyards have been unlocked!
I mentioned that they were unlocked in a previous update but here's the official announcement ahaha. Sorry to keep you all waiting!

Fantastic news, everyone!
Vinyl Stickers have been unlocked!
Now EVERY enamel pin pledge will come with stickers. I'm so ecstatic that we reached this goal because BOY do I love stickers! Thank you all SO so much! <3

campaign.story:
With Kickstarter, you pledge now and pay at the end of the campaign, and only if fully funded. If we do not reach our goal, you will never be charged. You can change your pledge at any time, reduce or add on rewards. For any questions about managing your pledge, please see the FAQ and / or contact us. We are always happy to help.
Greetings! We are Three Muses Ink, a trio of indie artists and authors. Friends since grade school, we express through writing, artwork and all things creative, forming our own independent publishing company and art house located in Anchorage, Alaska. 
Over 2018 year we've grown from just art and books, to creating enamel pins, able to create our art collections with the help of Kickstarter and amazing backers who believed in our art. 
The project this year is to do some work inspired by the beautiful place we live and create in, Alaska. We have several books and art projects planned, and we are starting with this set of large, hard enamel art pins in the theme of Alaska's plant and wildlife coupled with lanterns. 
We are known as the Land of the Midnight Sun, but that is coupled with long dark winters. Lanterns and light are a part of being an Alaskan to get us through those dark snowy times.
Instagram - @3MusesInk
Website - www.3MusesInk.com
The $900 is to fund the creation of 4 hard enamel pins depicting some of the favorite animals and plants from Alaska.
Should we reach our goal, we have 3 additional pins that can be unlocked as the campaign grows.   
We offer a special discount for Kickstarter backers. 
The Early Bird and Full Set tiers offer the BEST, lowest prices. The regular Kickstarter price is still lower than the retail price. After the campaign, these will be for sale at our website at regular retail prices. 
 Should we reach our goal, these stretch goals can be unlocked as the campaign grows.   
FAQ
Adding Pins
How do I add pins from this Kickstarter to my pledge? 
To add pins to your existing pledge, you need to add your pledge manually. You are able to do this by clicking “manage my pledge”.  
This is your price guide: 
Lanterns of Alaska Pins & Alaska Stag: $13 each 
To add pins from our website, please see designs and price at our shop. 
Example: If you have an Early Bird 1 Single pin tier at $12, but would like to add an Alaska stag to your $12 total, add $13 making it $25, plus shipping.  
Please message us if you have questions. We are always happy to help. 
Website Add Ons:
If you would like to add any of our other pins from out website or past pin campaigns, please message us here at Kickstarter. We can add any of our pins listed at our website shop to your pledge to save you on shipping and to help fund this Kickstarter.
For collections and prices, please visit our website www.3MusesInk.com
Three Muses Ink Website Shop
Our funding goal of $900 will be used to cover the following:
Pins, backing card, plastic bags, and rubber pin backs - 60% 
Shipping & postage, labels, bubble mailers - 30% 
Kickstarter Fees -10%
Once the project is funded, a backer survey will be sent to each backer, allowing you to select which pins you would like from the unlocked designs. 
All surveys must be completed within 5 days of campaign’s close date. If not completed, your pins will be selected randomly for you. Also, if you do not fill out the survey we cannot mail your Kickstarter rewards to you. We will have no address to ship to. 
Kickstarter opens: January 18, 2018
Closes: February 2, 2019 
Backer surveys due: 5 days after the campaign closes 
Kickstarter Funds arrive: 15 business days after close.
Creation of Pins at Manu: Creation of Pins at Manu: February - March (20-50 Days) 
Rewards sent to Backers: Late May
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The largest risk comes from the creation/manufacturing of the pins. We are working with a vendor in China, who has lots of experience in projects similar to ours. There is a chance that something may go wrong during the manufacturing process and if that happens it could cause a delay of shipping. We don’t anticipate this being an issue, as our vendor has done similar projects. If anything does happen, we will make sure to keep everyone informed and up to date regarding where we are in the process. The timeline for shipping is NOT solid due to these factors but we will keep all backers updated each step of the way.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: All pins are here and all rewards sent!
updates.update_content:
Hello All! 
 All the pins are finally here ! We have worked hard to process them and get them all out to you guys as quickly as we could! All orders were sent last night, so we hope all your lantern pins will arrive to you safely and quickly. Also we sent some free vinyl stickers along as an apology for the long wait. You guys have been the best!

updates.update_userinfo: The Pins are here, but there's in issue.
updates.update_content:
Hello All,
I have good news and some delay news. 
The pins have arrived and they are beautiful, but upon inspection we discovered only 3 of the designs have been made correctly. The Wolf, the Alaska Stag and the Raven have all come in correctly. The Salmon, the Bear, the Fox and the Moose all have to be remade.

updates.update_userinfo: Pins are almost on their way!
updates.update_content:
Hello All,
Exciting update here! The pins are ALMOST on their way to us! I finally got some preview pictures! They are not the best pictures, but we just had to share our first “ugly manu” pictures of our Alaska Lantern Pins!!
🦌They are still going through the check with our manu, but should be shipping to us soon! Hopefully we’ll have them all in hand early next week!

Hello All,
Just wanted to put our a little update.
The pins are currently still in production with our manufacturer. We were expecting to share pictures and news with you sooner, however our manu was delayed by the Chinese New Year Holiday far more than we were expecting. We no idea it would delay things so much, but this is the first year I've had to deal with this, so I'll know better for next year.

Hello All,
Just a little update here to tell everyone we got the Kickstarter funds and are starting on production of the pins. The Chinese Holiday has slowed our manufacturers a little bit, but we are now working with them on the vector art for the production and expect the pin making to begin early next week. We do think we're still on time with our timeline for them but will let you know if there are any delays that happen.

updates.update_userinfo: We did it!! Thank you so much!
updates.update_content:
Hello All, 
Thank you all so much for pledging and supporting us! We really wanted to create some beautiful Alaskan themed projects there year and were just not sure if anyone would want be excited about it. So thank you all so much for making this possible. We could not make this happen without you all!

We did it, everyone!
 We have unlocked all the pin designs! The Salmon and the River is now available to choose from, add to your pledge or just pledge for!

Hello All,
We are excited to announce we have unlocked the Bear and Blueberry design!

Hello All,
Welcome to Lanterns of Alaska pins Kickstarter campaign's first update! 
First we would like to thank each one of your for backing this project! We could not be more excited than to be able to produce these Alaska themed pins! So thank you so much, we could never do this without you backers!

project_data.project_name: Lanterns of Alaska - Hard Enamel Pins

campaign.story:
I've been sketching out RPG (Roll playing game) or D&D type dragons for years. I've always been a big RPGer ever since RPG games were paper and pencil and included games like Dungeons and Dragons. My favorite thing was creating a character and coming up with all the stats. I would also always draw my character in dragon form and would normally picked a druid or ranger as my class. Later when MMORPGs (Massive Multiplayer Online Role Playing Games) became a thing, I was hooked. From EverQuest to Guild Wars 2, I played just about all of them. 
Being a huge fan of RPGs, I thought it would be cool to take some of my dragon designs and make them into a set of enamel pins. 
Each pin will be done in soft enamel and be about 2" across or tall at the widest area. 
Why soft enamel? I've done both hard enamel and soft enamel in the past. Unfortunately, the hard enamel process of polishing the pin flat losses some of critical details. I may add hard enamel as a stretch goal later.  Check out the link to my video showing the difference between hard enamel and soft enamel. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2JH05JgI6Mk
All designs are unlocked!! 11 Different Dragon Designs & 4 color variants for the Dungeon Master Dragon!! 
First Pin Design: 
Why the healer? Well it's simple in an RPG they keep you alive, so you always need a healer. 
Pin will be around 2" soft enamel with gold detailing.  Each pin will have butterfly clutch pin backs.
Please note that colors might change slightly once the designs go to Pantone colors. 
Rewards:
One Soft Enamel Pin of your choice from any of the unlocked designs.
The "Holy Trinity" Set of 3 pins of your choice from any of the unlocked pins.
The "Dungeon Party" Set of 5 pins of your choice from any of the unlocked pins. 
The "Raid Party" Set of 11 pins of your choice from any of the unlocked pins. 
Please note that colors might change slightly once the designs go to Pantone colors. Also note that colors might look a little off because of differences in computer monitors, or even the lighting in the room. Also because of some of the complexities the designs might have to be changes a little. Like adding a background or a filling in a spot. 
 Color variants of The Dungeon Master including a Kickstarter exclusive limited Red color unlocks with The Dungeon Master at $3,800-Unlocked 
Free Random Stickers for all Backers if all designs unlock!!-Unlocked
Color variants of the mage (fire & arcane mage) unlocks at $3,900-Unlocked  
Add 1 pin from this Kickstarter for $13 each
3" Die cut stickers of the dragon of your choice- $5 each 
Past pins (if available) $10 each (you'll be able to pick designs after the Kickstarter ends)
Here are some sample of pins I have made in the past.
January: Kickstater launched 
February: Kickstarter ends after running for 30 days
Late February: Kickstarter release funds (about 2 weeks after it ends)
March: Finally artwork is sent over the factory. 
Pins should get to me in late March or early April.
Once the pins are in and double checked they get shipped out. This should be sometime in April 2019.
Shipping:
Domestic Shipping is included in all rewards! Sorry to the customers outside the US, but do to changes I have to ship as a package and can no longer ship as a flat. Customs and duties charges are not included in the shipping fees and are a responsibility of the buyer. 
And remember there is no added shipping cost no matter how many pins you get! 
International customers, you pay one flat shipping fee no matter how many pins you add! 
All items are shipped with First Class Mail, and insurance is not included. Buyers may upgrade to Priority Mail which includes insurance, upgrade is $7.20 for domestic or $25 for international (I sorry it's so expensive but I have no control over the USPS prices). Or insurance can be added for $3 for domestic and an additional $5 for international shipments. Just add the amount to your pledge and let me know so I can make a note of it. 
In the case of a lost shipment. Please understand that is the shipment does not get to you but the tracking number shows as delivered, there is nothing we can do, unless you purchased insurance. This should not be an issue but in the unforeseeable case that it does happen you must take it up with your local post office. We are not responsible for lost or stolen packages, or incorrect address.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I've done a lot of enamel pins in the past on Kickstarter and I already have the factory lined up to make the pins. The biggest challenge is shipping the pins out but thankfully I'm prepared for that. However there can always be unforeseen set backs but I have other factories in mind just in case something happens. 

There is a small chance that something could go wrong during the manufacturing and if that happens it could cause a delay in shipping. 

If anything happens, we be sure to update what's going on.

The timeline for shipping is just an estimate.

Colors may change a little to what works best for an enamel pin. And please remember that pantone colors will look a little different than they do on your computer monitor. But we have a pantone book to try and get the the closest color possible.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦
Shadow Box Insect Pins
Inspired by framed insect collections, this collaborative project by Coey Kuhn and Shy Custis draws on occult themes for a series of pins suitable for wear or display.
With cohesive motifs and colors across the series, you can mix and match pins into your ideal arrangements for framing, or into fitting combinations to wear with the day's outfit.
This series includes specialty additions like stone inlays, collar chains, and moving parts. Pledge now to help fund our first two sets, share with others to help unlock the rest!
Sample Photos of the Base Sets. Click for Fullview
✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦
Reward Details
All 8 pin sets have been unlocked!
5 mini accent pins (unlocked: free additional "Infinity" accent with every set of accents!)
5 stickers for all $10+ pledges
4x6 inch embossed backing cards (included with every set) for use in displays
Bonus pins unlocked! For info on how bonus pins will be awarded, see this update. 
 The final stretch goal has been met!! Every backer pledging to a pin tier will get the Sulfur Moth pin for free!
The series is plated in an antique gold finish, with black and white matte soft enamel, and clasp-style pin backs.
✦✦ Sets vs. Individual Pins ✦✦ We originally built this campaign around pin sets for logistical reasons; since the two of us fulfill KS rewards ourselves, shipping sets of pins would make the process much smoother with less room for error. Sets also allowed us to structure stretch goals to optimize how many pins might get unlocked. We never could have imagined it would be this successful!! We are completely floored by how this campaign is performing, and can't thank our backers enough.
Because of the campaign's amazing trajectory, we've partnered with BackerKit to allow $40+ backers to add additional sets AND individual pins to their existing pledges after funding (at a discount!). All pins will also be openly available on our shop after funding (including individuals), however at higher prices than being offered to backers.
Clink for Fullview
Detail specs for several of the specialty pins
✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦
 Stretch Goals
More pins are possible through stretch goals! 6 more sets of insect pins are unlockable at the goals below. 
✦✦ UPDATE ✦✦ Added goals for $60k and $100k because of the unexpected success! Thank you all so much, we're floored!
✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦
Fulfillment & Tentative Timeline
While all art for the series is completed and ready for production, please keep in mind fulfillment progress is dependent on the final number of backers and our manufacturer's processes. We gave ourselves a generous-but-tentative delivery date of October 2019, but will be updating backers regularly as production progresses should the project be funded.
If successful, surveys to collect backer's set choices and addresses will be sent out shortly after funding so that we can tally pin quantities to be produced. As this leaves several months between address collection and reward shipments, we will have the option open for backers to edit their address until shipments begin. We will also be announcing a couple weeks before shipments begin for those needing a reminder.
✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The largest potential problem is if something were to be delayed on our manufacturer's end; all art is complete and formatted, and we've already worked with our supplier on getting samples made for the base sets. All we need is funding to get everything made!

We do online sales and are regularly shipping orders out to customers. We're no strangers to shipping merch and customer service!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Welcome to my Desert Yield Enamel Pin Kickstarter! A few months ago I introduced 4 designs into the world and they have since become my most loved pins! So because of this and the fact that I really enjoyed designing them.. I did some more :D 
I do have a love for skulls and their aesthetic. My roses are added to the skulls as a contrast between life and death. 
As I have already mentioned, 4 designs have already been released and turned into pins! These will be available on this Kickstarter to help fund the new ones! They will unlock with the cat skull pin and if you choose just to pledge for one of these designs then I will send them out as soon as the funds have been sent to me :)
 15mm    Rose Gold, Silver or Gold    Black or White Enamel
 Crow: 30mm, silver   Buffalo: 35mm, silver   Stag: 40mm, silver 
 Anyway, getting into the new designs :)
The LIMITED EDITION unicorn skull pin will only have 100 made. They will also be made with hard enamel!
The LIMITED EDITION Trio Skull Pin will have only 100 made.
 The iron on patch will unlock at £450. 
If all goes well...
The tee will unlock at £700
 I would like to introduce my longsleeve baseball tee design :) my classic rose on the front left breast and the Trio skull design large on the back. I really hope we reach this goal as this will be my first piece of clothing I would release!
With any pledge, just add an extra ££ if you’d like more than one pin:
Add £5 per cat skull pin or Trio patch 
Add £6 per crow or buffalo skull pin 
Add £7 per unicorn or stag skull pin 
Add £8 per Trio skull pin
If the Kickstarter is successful 
Each backer will receive a survey to complete by including their choice(s) of pins and their mailing address. 
Cost breakdown
10% Kickstarter fees     60% manufacturing     30% postage and packaging
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is not my first Kickstarter but may be my first successful one. So I am new to the website and am learning as I go. I am also the only person involved in this project so I will be packaging the products and posting them myself which means there may be some small delays if there are a lot of orders.

I have a very loyal and trustworthy manufacturer that has produced some very high quality pins within a reasonable time frame. They have also given the thumbs up for the designs.

There is always a chance for delays in the process between manufacturing and delivery but I will do my best to deal with these issues and keep you all updated.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Hello! I'm Mollie, also known as @sugarxnova on instagram! I am a sweets-lover, graphic designer and pin maker! 
I love art pins and wanted to create this kickstarter in order to get some more artist flair into the world!  
Pledge now risk-free and pay later! Did you know you can increase, decrease or even cancel your pledge at any time during the Kickstarter! You will only be charged when the Kickstarter campaigns ends. If we don't reach our goal by the end of the the campaign date you will not be charged!
Pledging helps to unlock designs! You can pledge for all the items you want, regardless of their locked/unlocked status. Let's work together to get all these designs unlocked!
Pledging will not only help the pins get produced, but will give you a great discount! After this campaign has ended, all the unlocked pins and stickers will be sold for a higher price in my online store! 
If you are an early bird backer and you would like to add additional pins or stickers to your pledge: add $9 per pin and/or $2 per sticker to your current pledge total with shipping.   
If you are not an early bird backer and would like to add additional pins or stickers, see the examples below on how to do so. 
example #1: You want 7 pins, but only 2 stickers. To do this, select the "Good Drawer" pledge (2 pins + 2 stickers) and add 5 pins at $9 each for a total of $65 before shipping ($3 domestic, $5 international). 
example #2: You want 3 pins, and 5 stickers. To do this, select the "A Little Sketchy" pledge (3 pins + 3 stickers) and add 2 stickers at $2 each for a total of $36 before shipping. ($3 domestic, $5 international)
example #3: You only want 4 stickers and no pins. Simply select the "Stickers Only" pledge and pledge $2 for each sticker for a total of $8 before shipping. ($3 domestic, $5 international)
-
To change your pledge tier, click the the "Manage Your Pledge" button (at the top of the campaign page or by clicking your current reward tier). Then click the "Change your pledge" button and select "New reward tier".
To change your pledge amount, click the the "Manage Your Pledge" button (at the top of the campaign page or by clicking your current reward tier). Then click the "Change your pledge" button. Add your add-on total to the current pledge amount and it will update!
January 1 - Kickstarter Launches
January 25 - Kickstarter Ends 
End of January - Surveys sent out
Mid February - Production order placed
March - Pins & stickers arrive and I will begin shipping all orders out
April - Pins & Stickers are delivered to you! yay!
All parcels within the United States will receive a tracking number once the orders are shipped! 
For international backers:
International parcels are shipped using a Global Advantage Program. This postage method is untracked in order to keep costs low for international backers. Packages very rarely get lost in the mail, but if in the unlikely event this does happen, just reach out to me and I will make sure your are taken care of. I can be reached by email at hellosugarnova@gmail.com
Also, please be aware that International backers are responsible for any customs fees their country may ask for, so plan accordingly! 
 Here are some of my previous pin designs to give you an idea of what these will look like when they are all finished!
 Thank you so much for your support and pledges! 
xoxo
Mollie
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Delays in the pins' production and color variations are always a possibility when dealing with enamel pin manufacturers. I have a trusted manufacturer that I have used many times and feel confident in their abilities to get the pins made correctly and on time. 

I will keep all my backers updated continuously throughout the process and will do my best to keep everything moving smoothly. Please check back on this page for updates or email me at hellosugarnova@gmail.com if you have any additional questions.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello Everyone!

Sorry for the delay of this message! All of your rewards have officially been shipped out and are on their way to you!
If you are in the US and your package hasn't arrived, please send me a message and I can help figure out where your package is!

Hello again!
Just wanted to pop in and let you all know that your pins have started to ship! Woohoo! 
Unfortunately I just discovered that my tracking numbers were not sending. I will try and get those updated as soon as I can for my international backers, but in order to quickly get everyone's packages out I don't see me having time to update the tracking for US orders that have already shipped. Sorry! 
I'll send another update once all the packages have shipped, so if you don't have a tracking number (or have received your package) by then please message me and I'll send it over.

Hello again!
The pins have officially arrived to me as of yesterday morning and oh my, they are stunning! I am currently busy sorting through the pins and we are looking to continue to be right on schedule if not a bit ahead of it!
Check out my instagram for the latest sneak peeks at the designs, or if you like to be surprised just wait for your lovely package to arrive! :)

Happy March everyone! I just wanted to give you a quick update on the pins production! 
So I contacted my manufacturer and they let me know that the pins will be done in about a week and so everything is moving along right on schedule! It will still take me some time to sort through the pins (there are about 2,300 pins to sort through!😱💕) and then get all your orders packed so I don't expect the orders to go out until late March. 
But in the meantime, my manu sent me some sneak peek photos to help get us through until then! Enjoy!

Hello Everyone! I hope you are all doing well!
I just wanted to let you know that I have now successfully received the kickstarter funds and the pins are officially in production as of today! Woohoo!
We are right on track with our timeline for the pins being produced, as long as there are no glaring issues with the pins I receive.

Hey Everyone! 
I'm just finishing up the reward surveys and should have those sent out shortly, but I wanted to send this as a reference for the pins & stickers you will be able to choose from.
The surveys wont be multiple choice, but will be write-in so make sure you know what pins/stickers you want!

Hey Everyone!
Thank you again for helping fund my kickstarter! Now comes the fun part, getting the pins & stickers made and sent to you!
I have not sent out the surveys yet but am working on getting those completed and will be sending them out shortly. (I'll post another update when I do).

WOOHOO!!
We have exceeded our stretch goal of $9000 and the rainbow inkwell pins have officially been unlocked! Thank you everyone!
We only have a few days to go in the campaign and once it's complete, I will be sending out the backer surveys to you.

Hey Everyone!
I received so many great suggestions for what new pins you all would like to see, and thanks to your feedback I have released a new goal: The Rainbow Inkwell! 
This pin is extra magical and was made especially for all the amazing calligraphers out there!

campaign.story:
A wistful aquamarine lynx, inspired by a commissioned tribal tattoo design I made 3 years ago, http://fav.me/d9n7zbt as well as my adoration for astrology and these big cats!
This soft enamel pin will be 40mm (1.6") long, with rainbow anodized metal.  It will come with a metal butterfly clasp by default, but I hope to include additional rubber backs if the goal is surpassed!  Any pins remaining after this campaign will be sold at conventions and on Etsy at a slightly higher price.
close-up of the artwork
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This will be my fourth pin design and my third completed Kickstarter campaign if funding is successful! I haven't run into any problems or delays in the past.

It should take around one month to receive the pins once I place the order with the manufacturer. I will keep everyone updated if there are major delays, but you'll most likely receive your pin in February - early March of 2019.

INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING has increased substantially due to a somewhat recent restriction by USPS requiring merchandise to be shipped only as a package rather than a large envelope. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. http://blog.stamps.com/2017/12/26/important-usps-making-changes-first-class-mail-international-flats/
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello everyone!  The Lunar Lynxes have finally arrived to me today, and I'll be shipping them out to everyone right away.  You should be getting an email from Paypal with your tracking number within the next few days.  Thanks to most of you for being so awesomely patient!  This was the slowest manufacturer I've ever worked with, but I'm very happy with the quality of the pins.
So no one mistakes it for a sticker and accidentally ruins it, I've included a 2" magnet with each pin!

The sample photos are finally here!  The first photo shows them with broken lines in the muzzle and ear, but that's fixed up in the second.  Everything's settled, and hopefully I'll have them in a few weeks!

Pins are now likely to be shipped next month since production has been delayed quite a bit.
My original manufacturer closed for the Chinese New Year right before the Kickstarter funds came through.  Once they came back (February 12th), they wanted to remove a lot of detail that I wanted to keep in the design, so I had to find a new manufacturer for these.  Everyone I contacted appeared to be very busy and slow to reply, and I couldn't get anything finalized until the 21st.

This pin was previously described as hard enamel, and it was just brought to my attention that rainbow plated pins can only be made with soft enamel.  I don't think this will make any considerable difference, and it will still look/feel like every other rainbow pin!  Regardless, the correction has been made in the project details!

On only the second day, the Lunar Lynx has been fully funded!  Thank you all for your help!  We still have to wait 28 more days for the campaign to end, but I'm so excited to get these into production next month!

campaign.story:
Spooky will be the newest addition to the Kabuki Fox plush line! So just who is Spooky? He's cute, cuddly, and well...dead. But don't let that put you off! It's hard making friends when you're dead and Spooky is lonely. All he wants is someone to take care of him and to return the favor! He's an expert in cuddling (self proclaimed) and has no job experience, but he'll work extra hard to be your best friend!
About The Plush
Spooky is my newest plush design! He's a member of my Kabuki Fox plush toy line which are cute foxes inspired by Japanese kitsune! The "Spooky" plush is 8 inches tall (11 if you count the ears) and 8 inches in length. He's made out of minky fabric with printed details on his body, while his face and ears are a mix of embroidery and applique. Did you notice his heart shaped bones? He's truly a unique plush!
Don't miss out on your chance to own Spooky! He's available for a special Kickstarter price of $20! After the Kickstarter is over Spooky will retail for $25 on my website.
Here are Spooky's original prototype photos!
Why Kickstarter?
Spooky needs a bit of help! The manufacturing costs of quality plush toys is very high, and it's often a struggle for small businesses to self fund without running the risk of debt. By using Kickstarter I can gauge the interest for my products and bring attention to a potential new IP (intellectual property)! 
Rewards
Enamel pin mock up design. The pin will feature black metal and glow in the dark bones!
Add On Rewards
Instructions: Simply increase your pledge amount by the total price of add-ons you want and then save!
After the campaign I'll send you a survey that will ask you what items you'd like to use your additional pledge money for. 
Example: If you want multiple Spooky plush and the enamel pin, select 'Loot Hunter Spooky!' as your reward tier and add additional funds equal to the amount of Spooky plush you want. $20 = 1 additional plush, $40 = 2 additional plush, etc.
The baby Kabuki Foxes come in two different colors! Red (Fire) and Blue (Water). They have embroidered details and cute ribbon bows! They're about 6 inches long.
The Kabuki Foxes come in two different colors! Red (Fire) and Blue (Water). They're 12 inches tall (17 if you count the ears) and 13 inches in length. They have embroidered and appliqued details, plus their very own custom printed bows!
Stretch Goals
If this goal is reached all backers of physical reward tiers will receive a 3 inch PVC keychain featuring Spooky's logo!
                                                                  (Keychain Mock Up)
If this goal is reached a set of three 3x3 inch vinyl die cut stickers will be added to all pledge tiers that contain physical rewards!
                                                                (Sticker Mock Ups)
 If Spooky reaches $6000 a brand new 2 inch glitter enamel pin variant will be added to all pledge tiers containing physical rewards! Ooo, so pretty. So shiny!
                                                       (Glitter enamel pin mock up)
If this goal is reached Spooky's Loot Bag will be added to all pledge tiers containing physical rewards! It's a 4x6 inch velvet drawstring bag with purple satin lining, Spooky's favorite color, and his logo screen printed on the front! Cool!
                                                          (Spooky's Loot Bag mock up)
If Spooky reaches $10,000 a new special limited edition item will be added to the add on shop! It's super secret so Spooky doesn't want to reveal it just yet.
New stretch goals will be added if we go beyond $10,000!
Shipping (Domestic & International)
 If fully funded, Spooky will set sail across the sea! The plushes will travel by ocean freight from the manufacturer to me, PlanetPlush. Once I have the plush in hand, I'll package them up and send them to my backers along with any other chosen rewards!
All domestic (within the United States) orders will normally take 2 - 3 days to arrive after  shipping.
International orders (outside of the United States) will ship via USPS First Class mail. First Class mail can take anywhere between 2 - 6  weeks to arrive. It's possible that it may take longer depending on your  country's customs process. I strongly urge my international backers to be aware of any potential customs fees or taxes their country may  apply. 
Timeline
 If I meet my goal, Kickstarter will hold the funds for 14 days.  After it's processed and released I'll pay our manufacturer to produce Spooky. Here's what the timeline looks like! 
Approximately 45-60 days for production
  Approximately 14 days to arrive to PlanetPlush via air shipping
  2 weeks to ship to backers!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I'm experienced with having goods made overseas. My manufacturer has produced plush for me before and I'm comfortable working with them. Spooky is ready to go into production once funded.

It is possible that the factory may have delays. This could be due to the need to order more materials, holidays, inclement weather, or another unforeseen event. I have great communication with my factory and if a situation arises, I'll be sure to find a solution to the issue and let my backers know of any delays.

I also have experienced, on hand customs brokerage. If for any reason Spooky is selected by customs for inspection, my broker will be available to help ease this process. If this happens, customs will have my full cooperation and I'll disclose any issues or possible delays with my backers.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Hello! I'm JunkYardRabbit, an Apprentice Tattooist, Digital Artist and Natural History Illustrator working on creating items to sell online. Floral Creatures was my first Kickstarter and was fully funded, as was my recent Enamel Pin, Magical Unicorns! These designs will feature creatures from the deep, such as Orcas, Whales,  Nautilus ect, with flowers and crystals!
Stickers and additional designs will become available as stretch goals, and depending on how we go, I hope to also have patches made of the pin designs If we reach certain tiers.
All the pins will be (unless otherwise specified):
 Hard Enamel 
 Rainbow Plated Metal 
 Rubber Clutch 
 High Quality 
 Include a backing card 
The pins will eventually be available via my online store https://www.etsy.com/au/shop/ITheJunkyardl?ref=seller-platform-mcnav  once the campaign is finished, though pins purchased in this campaign include a special kickstarter discount. 
You will be able to choose your pin at the end of the campaign via a survey.
In addition to the current tiers available, you can add more pins to your pledge, so if you would like more than 5 pins, add money by clicking the "Manage" button next to your pledge, add to your total, then click "Change your Pledge".
I’ll update this part with dimensions and samples of the pins if they arrive in time! I’m really excited about using a rainbow plated metal this time , so I will Try and make the designs simple enough to stand out well with this type of Plating. 
Crystal Orca Goal: $500
Crystal Orca $500 Teir -!UNLOCKED!-
Galaxy Whale Goal: $1200
Galaxy Whale $1200 Teir -!UNLOCKED!-
Crystal Nautilus Goal: $3100
Crystal Nautilus $3100 Teir -LOCKED-
Cost Breakdowns
December 6th -21st January : Kickstarter Campaign duration 
January  - Febuary: Surveys sent (if Stretch Goals are met you can choose which pin/s you’d like if chose from that tier) 
March- April: Manufacturing is checked and completed, products are shipped to me and assembled to get ready for shipping! 
April-May: Rewards are shipped out! Please Note:
This timeframe could change to be slower or even quicker depending on how fast everything is processed and sent to me. I’ll try my hardest to stick to this time line and let everyone know if there are any set backs or if things have sped up!
If you would like to see more of my work please see the links below!
Etsy | Instagram | Twitter | Facebook | DeviantART |
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This will be my Third Enamel Pin series I’ve produced, so I feel pretty confident about the shipping and manufacturing times, But I’ve still given long timeframes for these to be completed. I’m confident in selling online as I have been doing it for some years now. If any other costs arise out of the campaign, I will use my own money to rectify any issues that may arise!

I’ll try and keep everyone as updated on the progress of things as much as I can and answer any questions that may arise!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Show your love for Studio Ghibli films!
The Studio Ghibli spinning pin set are finally here! This set include designs from several films including Spirited Away, How's Moving Castle, Princess Mononoke, Kiki's Delivery Service, Ponyo, and My Neighbor Totoro!  Each design will be unlocked once the goal is reached. I've had an experience designing an enamel pin in the past (scroll down to the bottom for picture).
Pledging is the only way to unlock the design you want. You can always change your pledge amount until the last day of the campaign.
You will not be charged until the campaign is successfully funded. 
Since these designs will all be spinning pins, please watch the video below to see how they will work. 
SPIRITED AWAY PIN ADD-ON IS NOW AVAILABLE!
Note: This pin is not part of this Kickstarter goals, therefore it will only part of your pledge by adding $15. 
-Please see the first update on how to add this to your reward-
A little bit about me, my name is Jessica and I’m the owner of Daruma Cat (@daruma.cat on instagram) or Daruma Cat on Etsy. As a graphic designer, illustrator and designer, I enjoy drawing whimsical things relating to anime and video games. I’m back for my second kickstarter this time around. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact me :)
 Disclaimer:  I'm not the intellectual property owner of the characters used in these designs. 
10% - Kickstarter Fee
10% - Packaging
80% - Production
December 12 - 31  : Kickstarter duration (Surveys will be sent after the campaign is successfully funded)
 January: Kickstarter fund received & Production time
February : All the pins will be shipped!
Please note that these are only the estimate, if there are any changes, all backers will be notified otherwise.
A sample of my past enamel pin

campaign.story:
Hi, there! Thanks for taking a look at my campaign! My name is Maddy from Jinxyee Studios. I'm new to the pin making community but I'm no stranger to crafting and selling. I've run a seasonal business for the past three years called Lei's By Maddy. 
I've been collecting pins for about a year now and I decided to take the leap into trying to design some myself ! I've had a love for art for as long as I remember, so being able to draw something and turn it into a tangible object for others to enjoy is amazing to me. 
This campaign is actually the second part of a garden series I made previously! I received a ton of positive feedback and requests to do a second set including more characters from different movies. 
Previous Garden Set
 ❀ Please keep in mind that your pledge payment will not be processed until the end of the campaign on Wednesday, December 5th. 
 ❀ Each design is unlocked by different goal amounts! Don't wait until the goal gets unlocked. Instead, help it get unlocked faster by pledging now!
 ❀ If your desired pin design does not get unlocked, you may receive a refund
 As you can see, most of the funds will be put into production of the pins. Packaging includes the bubble mailers, backing cards, and protective sleeves. Kickstarter takes a 10% fee for using their service. The back up funds are a small amount used in case there are any delays in production and shipping needs to be sped up or if there are any surprise costs that may occur.  
 November 5 - December 5 ❀ Kickstarter runs
Mid - Late December ❀ Funds confirmed & production begins
Early January ❀ Pins arrive & are individually inspected for quality & imperfections
Mid - Late January ❀ Pins arrive at your doorstep
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Like any kickstarter, there is a chance my project may not get funded. If that is the case, your pledge will be cancelled, and your card will not be charged.

I am very happy to say that these designs have already been approved by my manufacturer so there are little to no risks for production. I have used the same manufacturer for all my pins and have had great, constant communication with them. I am extremely happy with the quality of their pins and they have been recommended by several pin makers.

If there are any delays, I will keep you updated constantly. The back up funds mentioned previously in the 'Funds Breakdown' can be used to speed up shipping if necessary.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: First Batch of orders going out
updates.update_content:
Please keep an eye on your email for your tracking numbers. Early bird rewards and keychains have all been packed up and will be brought to the post office today.
INTERNATIONAL ORDERS Please message me your phone number. It is required for shipping internationally!
There are a couple people who haven’t filled out their surveys yet. I have messaged you. Please fill them out so I can send your rewards to you 💕

Hi everyone!
YES I’ve gone through all the pins. I literally spent every spare second I had with pins in my hands.
I’ve only had a problem with one pin. The Porky Pilot. As you all remember from one of my previous updates, he was made with the wrong color on his nose. The factory fixed the color but in this process, underfilled his nose quite a bit.
The factory will be going on vacation so they can’t fix the pins until early February when they come back. I will attach photos of what the pin looks like with the under filled nose. I will be reaching out to each person individually over the next couple days who have this pin in their order. You can either choose to get the pin how it is or you can wait until the pins are remade.

Hi everyone!! I’m so excited to say that all the pins have arrived !!
Please keep in mind it’s going to take me a bit to sort through all of these.
I’m also waiting for my shipment of the restock of the sold out pins from the last set (like totoro). They should be arriving soon!
I will pack up orders as soon as I can. I will probably be shipping out orders of keychains and bottle openers first (only if you pledged for JUST these items). Then early bird backers and then everyone else.

Hi everyone! I just got some pictures from the manufacturer of the pins ! I’m extremely happy with how they came out!!
There were a few adjustments that had to get made if you look closely but nothing major to designs. This was just to cut some small costs and keep the designs as clear as possible.
The only pin that isn’t finished is the Porco Rosso pin. They made a mistake to the color of his nose. This is being changed and he will be sent to me as soon as he is done.

AHHHHHHH!! There were some minor adjustments that had to be made to the mold of this because of the size of the bottle opener but the factory just sent a photo of the updated mold and I’m so In LOVE.
LOOK HOW HUGE HE IS. AN ABSOLUTE UNIT.
If anyone didn’t pledge for it but would like it added to your reward, let me know! We can arrange the difference in payment through PayPal.

& im so in love with them !!
I took photos of it in my hand so you can see how big they are.
You can still add these to your pledge! Feel free to message me if you’re interested and we can arrange a payment through PayPal and it will be shipped with the rest of your rewards.
For those who ordered JUST this keychain, I’ll be mailing it out to you on Wednesday.

Hi everyone!
I thought it’d be cool to share a photo my manu sent me. Please keep in mind this is EXTREMELY early stages of the pin. No gold plating or color has been added. I just wanted to share in case anyone was curious on the process (:
The pins marked off are surprise pins that will be added to my shop.

updates.update_userinfo: Funds received and pins put into production!
updates.update_content:
Production has officially begun! I’m insanely excited!
The manufacturer predicts they’ll be done around January 10th. Please keep in mind, this is just an estimated projection date and it’s not guaranteed. I’ll also have to quality check the pins once they come and and send them all out. I’m guessing that you’ll all receive them towards the end of January at the latest.
Please feel free at anytime to reach out to me if you have any questions. Once I get any progress photos from the factory, I’ll be sure to post them on an update.

campaign.story:
Hello! It's Cat here! I wish I could say I'm a graduate designer, or an insta-famous artist, but I'm merely a high schooler with a BIG dream. My name is Catherine Tang, and here's my story. :)
Growing up, art was always something respected in my household, but not valued half as much as math or science. Though I loved my art classes, I soon had to stop to pursue "more important" things. 
But even though I couldn't take classes anymore, I continued to pursue my passion in other ways... decorating my room with DIYs, paintings, and dried flowers... painting my jeans one night at 3am. Then, a major milestone occurred: I started Bullet Journaling. 
 I post my spreads on @catandcreate, and though my community is small (I LOVE YOU GUYS!!!), it's my creative outlet and way to keep track of my art and progress.
Now, as much as I love art, I genuinely love math and science too! (Yep not an English person.) STEM stands for: Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics. I realized that Art and STEM shouldn't be viewed as mutually exclusive; in fact, my creativity HELPS me in my pursuit for these fields!
As a girl who loves math, and feels that more girls should be confident and given the chance to embrace their love for STEM, I wish to empower females in the pursuit of STEM through my designs, and show the literal integration between the three:
Now with enamel pins, you can express your beliefs, or simply "wear" the art you love; I own quite a few myself! Thus, from my love for both fields and my random doodles (scroll down to see!), came this CRAZY IDEA to sell my OWN PINS, SO HERE I AM!  
I hope to spread positive messages with the AWARENESS and REPRESENTATION raised through this project! 
 *Now every pin comes with a FREE stretch goal sticker!!!*
(SCROLL DOWN FOR UNLOCKED 7TH PIN DESIGN!!)
 ♦  As the title suggests, the designs integrate the "Nerdy" and the Aesthetics
♦  All pins are Hard Enamel with Gold Plating & comes with 2 Metal Clutches
Whether you support this cause, or simply like my designs (which I really hope you do), please consider buying a pin or two for yourself OR a friend!! 
It will really mean a lot, and though I am young, I promise that I will dedicate my 120% in executing this project. I poured blood, sweat, and tears (okay slight exaggeration), a total of three months, and many hours at boba stores into the designs. If successful, I hope to further develop my creative work as well!
                                    ♦ ♦ ♦ PLEDGE NOW RISK-FREE, PAY LATER ♦ ♦ ♦
You will only be charged when the Kickstarter ends (after 30 days), if we reach the $500 base goal. You can also always change your pledge at any time during the Kickstarter.
♦ 1ST STRETCH GOAL-$800 USD [UNLOCKED]: VINYL STICKERS
♦ 1 random FREE Sticker for every pledge!
♦ ADD $2 to your pledge for each additional sticker! *If you add 1 or more, you get to choose the designs for all stickers in your pledge, including the free one!
----------------------
♦ 2ND STRETCH GOAL [UNLOCKED ($3,000 USD)]: 7th Pin!
Design was voted by backers themselves (out of 3 possibilities)! 
 Thank you so much for making this happen! You guys are awesome! Read below for how to add a pin to your pledge!
To add a vinyl sticker: ADD $2 for each additional sticker of your choice! *If you add 1 or more stickers, you get to choose design for ALL stickers included in your pledge, including that free one!*
To add an enamel pin: 
IF you pledged for 1-5 PINS: ADD $8 to your pledge!! OR change your pledge to a higher tier, there are still a FEW early bird tiers!!
The math took me a while to figure out, but trust me on it, adding $8 works for all pledges, whether if your original pledge is early bird or not!
IF you pledged for 6 PINS and want 7(or more): Go ahead and add $7 to your pledge for each additional pin (as a gratitude from me)!
 ♦  The below kind of gives you an idea about how my designs came about, in case if you're curious! My pin designs are 100% original ideas! I use a Wacom - Intuos Creative Pen Tablet to draw them.
♦   Shoutout out to everyone who has given me advice and suggestions, I'm super thankful!!
 ♦   The goal is set to be entirely put towards the production and delivery of the pins. It accounts for the manufacturing of the pins, Kickstarter fees, packaging of the pins themselves and of parcels, and shipping to backers. 
This project's goal is in no way to gain profit. The prices are accurate and calculated to be fully put towards the cost of the entire project.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The biggest risk will be delay in sending out the pins. The production process of pins can take approximately 3-4 weeks. I want to give my backers quality products, therefore I will actively communicate with my manufacturer, as well as the post office during the time of shipping.

Any updates and delays will be IMMEDIATELY communicated.

That being said, I already found a great manufacturer, and I am working with a middle-women, so the risks should be pretty low. 

If damage occurs under my accountability, I will gladly have a replacement item sent to you as well.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
